Sa musique se place dans un soft rock ind√© bien teint√© 90‚Äôs, et sonne comme le coup de t√©l√©phone que l‚Äôon passe √† sa meilleure amie apr√®s une s√©ance r√©volutionnaire chez son psy.Arm√©e d‚Äôune honn√™tet√© brutale et de beaucoup d‚Äôauto-d√©rision, elle choisit de mettre un gros coup de projecteur sur ses ins√©curit√©s les plus profondes, jusqu'√† ce que l‚Äôon voit les montagnes insurmontables se changer en de petits cailloux color√©s.

author: iG Gente
title: Filho de John Lennon √© submetido a cirurgia de emerg√™ncia ap√≥s diagn√≥stico de c√¢ncer
text:
O filho mais velho do ex-Beatle John Lennon , o cantor Julian Lennon, de 61 anos, revelou em suas redes sociais nesta quarta-feira (18) que precisou passar por uma cirurgia de emerg√™ncia nos √∫ltimos dias ap√≥s descobrir um novo melanoma. H√° alguns anos, Julian enfrentou um c√¢ncer de pele e, agora, precisou lidar com mais um caso.
‚ÄúFui visitar minha querida dermatologista, Dra. Tess, em Los Angeles, como fa√ßo regularmente. Ela foi a respons√°vel por descobrir e tratar meu c√¢ncer de pele alguns anos atr√°s, literalmente salvando minha vida. Desta vez, recebi um alerta urgente da Dra. para retornar a Los Angeles, pois ela detectou duas novas √°reas na minha pele ‚Äì no ombro e no antebra√ßo ‚Äì, uma das quais era um melanoma que precisava ser removido o mais r√°pido poss√≠vel‚Äù, escreveu Julian em um post.
O melanoma √© o tipo mais grave e letal de c√¢ncer de pele, com alto risco de se espalhar para outras partes do corpo.
‚ÄúEm vez de passar o final do ano montando minha √°rvore de Natal e relaxando em casa, voei direto de Nova York para Los Angeles ap√≥s terminar meus compromissos, e fui direto do aeroporto para a cirurgia com um cirurgi√£o recomendado pela Dra., que passou v√°rias horas me operando, na esperan√ßa de que tiv√©ssemos margens limpas no final do procedimento, o que significaria estar livre do c√¢ncer‚Äù, completou o cantor.
Julian afirmou que a opera√ß√£o ‚Äúfoi um sucesso‚Äù, mas o resultado da bi√≥psia ainda n√£o foi divulgado.

author: news@lincolnshireecho.co.uk (Sebastian Mann)
title: Chance to work at Butlin's Skegness as 50 new job openings made available
text: Eager fans of a popular coastal resort in Lincolnshire could make it their next place of work in 2024. Around 50 jobs have opened at Butlin's in Skegness, including team leaders, cleaners and maintenance crews. The [jobs](https://jobs.butlins.com/en/postings/ac9215e4-e9b4-4f07-8282-f2033251faaf) will coincide with the opening of 128 new premium lodges in May, which will form the new Maple Walk village. Jeremy Fletcher, the resort's director, said: "This gives anyone looking for a change this year the chance to be part of something brand-new and the opportunity to start a career with us at a really exciting time." He added: "2024 is going to be an incredible year at Butlin‚Äôs Skegness. Following an amazing 2023 where we opened Butlin's SKYPARK and our new-look fairground, this year sees the launch of our brand-new premium lodges and the Maple Walk village." Poll: [What's the best sandwich shop in Lincolnshire?](https://xd.wayin.com/display/container/dc/7fc365a3-1d67-40e2-a670-6ead5bab8603) The jobs are a mix of part-time and full-time roles, catering to different levels of experience, and training will be offered. Maple Walk will also recruit additional members of the resort's safety team and 'welcome hosts'. The recruitment process is carried out in four main stages, beginning with an application before progressing to a review, a phone interview, and then a recruitment session. Opening for the May half-term, the lodges will be able to sleep a maximum of six guests and will be situated less than five minutes from the heart of the main resort. The ¬£12m village will also feature a new play area and some lodges will be fitted for disabled access. A limited-time offer is also up for grabs for families hoping to get their 2024 holidays booked early. The breaks start at ¬£59 on a term-time deal, and there's an additional 10 per cent off all holidays in place until January 16. Likewise, the adults-only Big Weekenders will start at ¬£69 per person with a 30 per cent discount available on all events, up until January 16.

author: @theBAtimes
title: Milei government shutters office dedicated to prevention of gender violence | Buenos Aires Times
text: President Javier Milei‚Äôs government will dissolve a government department dedicated to halting gender violence, it emerged Thursday. The news came to light just three days after tens of thousands of demonstrators took to the streets for the annual Ni Una Menos march against gender violence. Claudia Barcia, the head of the Undersecretariat for Protection Against Gender Violence, tendered her ‚Äúindeclinable‚Äù resignation in protest at the decision. According to reports, she was informed via WhatsApp message on Wednesday that her department, which oversees the 144 emergency telephone hotline and the Acompa√±ar programme assisting those at risk of gender violence, would be shut down. Only two weeks ago, oversight of the department was transferred from the Human Capital Ministry to the Justice Ministry. Staff and workload are to be transferred to the National Human Rights department and its Access to Justice Undersecretariat, the Noticias Argentinas news agency reported. News of the changes only emerged after Barcia‚Äôs resignation letter began circulating online. ‚ÄúI am writing to let you know that yesterday I received a WhatsApp call at 7.57pm from the Secretary of Human Rights, Alberto Ba√±os, through which he informed me that the Undersecretariat for Protection Against Gender Violence, which is under the hierarchical orbit of the Secretariat of Justice of the Justice Ministry of Justice in accordance with decrees No. 450 and 451/24, will cease to exist,‚Äù reads the text signed by Barcia, an ex-prosecutor at the Buenos Aires Public Prosecutor's Office who has specialised in gender violence for more than two decades. The future of the department‚Äôs workers, which originally numbered 600 and was slashed to 200 under Barcia‚Äôs time in office, remains unknown. "We are faced with a total hollowing out of policies for the prevention of gender-based violence," said the department‚Äôs workers in a statement posted online. Argentina has a longstanding problem with gender violence. According to court data, femicides rose 11 percent last year from the previous year with one femicide every 35 hours. Milei has faced regular criticism over women‚Äôs rights issues. Upon taking office he shuttered the Women, Gender & Diversity Ministry, downgrading it to a Secretariat and absorbing its departments into other portfolios. Argentina‚Äôs libertarian leader is a known opponent of abortion and his administration has not ruled out an attempt to repeal the Voluntary Interruption of Pregnancy Law passed by Congress in December 2020. During a speech at the World Economic Forum at Davos earlier this year, he described abortion as "a tragedy" and slammed the "radical feminist agenda." ‚Äì TIMES/NA

organizations.name: undersecretariat for protection against gender violence

author: T13
title: ‚ÄúNegro, te quedan seis meses‚Äù: Miguel Pi√±era detalla su delicado estado de salud
text:
‚ÄúNegro, te quedan seis meses‚Äù: Miguel Pi√±era detalla su delicado estado de salud
Miguel ‚ÄúNegro‚Äù Pi√±era, m√∫sico y hermano del fallecido expresidente Sebasti√°n Pi√±era,[ fue internado](https://www.t13.cl/noticia/espectaculos/internado-negro-pinera-clinica-del-sector-oriente-santiago-19-12-2024), este jueves, en una cl√≠nica del sector oriente de la regi√≥n Metropolitana por el delicado estado de salud que padece.
En una entrevista que ser√° emitida en el programa [Primer Plano de Chilevisi√≥n](https://www.chilevision.cl/primer-plano/promos/te-quedan-6-meses-negro-pinera-en-intima-entrevista-con-primer-plano), el propio Miguel Pi√±era cont√≥ que padece leucemia y que su situaci√≥n actual es grave.
[
Lee Tambi√©n
](/noticia/espectaculos/sabrina-sosa-confirmo-esta-una-relacion-exseleccionado-nacional-19-12-2024)
Sabrina Sosa confirm√≥ que est√° en una relaci√≥n con exseleccionado nacional: "S√≠, estamos en pareja"
El ‚ÄúNegro‚Äù Pi√±era asegur√≥ que la especialista que lo atendi√≥ le dijo que le quedaba poco tiempo de vida, seg√∫n se escucha en el adelanto del programa que ser√° emitido el domingo.
‚ÄúEsta vez la doctora me dijo ‚ÄòNegro, te quedan seis meses‚Äô‚Äù, cuenta Pi√±era.
En la misma conversaci√≥n, el tambi√©n personaje televisivo y exparticipante del [reality show de Canal 13 ‚ÄúPalabra de Honor‚Äù](https://www.t13.cl/etiqueta/palabra-de-honor), reflexion√≥ sobre la muerte, y record√≥ a su fallecido hermano Sebasti√°n Pi√±era.
[
Lee Tambi√©n
](/noticia/espectaculos/significativo-regalo-culto-repenning-priscilla-cumpleanos-alguien-excepcional-19-12-2024)
El significativo regalo de "culto" que Repenning le dio a Priscilla por su cumplea√±os: "Esto es para alguien excepcional"
‚ÄúQu√© le voy a tener miedo a la muerte, aparte me voy a encontrar con mi hermano. Aparte ya me mand√≥ un WhatsApp: ‚ÄòNegro, trae la guitarra‚Äô‚Äù, dice en tono de broma.
‚ÄúQuiero morirme sin dar pena, no quiero dar l√°stima‚Äù, reflexiona en otro extracto de la entrevista.
‚ÄúSiento que no es un mal momento para partir‚Äù, expresa.
De momento el estado de salud del ‚ÄúNegro‚Äù Pi√±era es reservado, aunque se mantendr√≠a internado por al menos los pr√≥ximos cinco o seis d√≠as, seg√∫n inform√≥ el programa [‚ÄúHay que decirlo‚Äù de Canal 13.](https://www.13.cl/programas/hay-que-decirlo)
En sus redes sociales, el mismo Miguel Pi√±era confirm√≥ su delicado estado de salud y asegur√≥ que ‚Äúse vienen tiempos dif√≠ciles‚Äù
‚ÄúQueridos amigas y amigos. Como ya sabr√°n estoy muy delicado de salud. Este a√±o no ha sido f√°cil, parti√≥ mi hermano el pasado 06 de febrero. Gracias a dios durante estos meses he tenido el honor de recorrer mi Chile lindo y querido, cantando y haci√©ndole un humilde homenaje a mi hermano Sebasti√°n. Se vienen tiempos dif√≠ciles. Solamente quiero agradecer todo el cari√±o del mundo que me han dado durante mis 50 a√±os de trayectoria musical‚Äù, escribi√≥.
[S√≠guenos en](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiEOgjh55R1O_OHSPw0T00iXYqFAgKIhDoI4eeUdTvzh0j8NE9NIl2)

author: Alex Christy; June 6
title: Mika Hopes D-Day Opens GOP's 'Hearts To The Concept Of Democracy' | MRCTV
text: It was inevitable that with the 80th anniversary commemorations of the D-Day landings in France, MSNBC‚Äôs Morning Joe would politicize possibly the last major anniversary with living veterans by attacking Republicans. Sure enough, co-host Mika Brzezinski did precisely that on Thursday, as she demanded, ‚Äúwith respect,‚Äù that party leaders ‚Äúopen their hearts to the concept of democracy.‚Äù Brzezinski declared that ‚ÄúYou know, Mike Barnicle, it's hard not to think about how demented our politics are today when we look at these heroes and we ponder this moment of unimaginable magnitude, but this conversation reminded me of something I think is worth saying about some of our Republican leaders right now, and I say it with respect, but our democracy is a privilege. It is fragile, and it is a privilege and Republican leaders following Donald Trump's autocratic tendencies are validating and reinforcing his violent anti-democratic ways on such a grand scale.‚Äù It got worse from there. Without much respect, she added, ‚ÄúThey almost remind me, of sort, of the entitled children of America's democracy. Entitled because they don't care what it took to build it. Unappreciative of the sacrifice that it took to get here and emboldened for their own advancement of power.‚Äù [see [NewsBusters ](https://www.newsbusters.org/blogs/nb/alex-christy/2024/06/06/mika-hopes-d-day-opens-gops-hearts-concept-democracy)for more]

author: Redacci√≥n Los Andes
title: Lo que el Zonda dej√≥: incendio, refugio da√±ado, accidentada inauguraci√≥n y eventos suspendidos
text: El viento Zonda baj√≥ con furia durante la madrugada en gran parte de la provincia de Mendoza. Afortunadamente no se reportaron heridos, aunque las fuertes r√°fagas ocasionaron ca√≠das de √°rboles, voladuras de techos y otros inconvenientes ya ‚Äúcl√°sicos‚Äù como la suspensi√≥n de clases y eventos al aire libre. Defensa Civil report√≥ hasta las 7:45 de esta ma√±ana que Las Heras era el departamento m√°s afectado, con un total de 22 reclamos de los vecinos. Estos inclu√≠an 14 √°rboles ca√≠dos, cinco techos volados, dos cables cortados y una chapa colgante. En Guaymall√©n, las autoridades indicaron inicialmente seis √°rboles ca√≠dos, una voladura de techo y tres cables cortados, mientras que en Godoy Cruz hubo cinco √°rboles ca√≠dos, dos cables cortados, una voladura de techo, un sem√°foro averiado y hasta un port√≥n ca√≠do. Por ahora, el reporte oficial se√±ala 57 incidentes. Se actualizar√° con el correr de las horas seg√∫n las novedades. Mientras que en la Capital, el viento provoc√≥ la ca√≠da e 5 √°rboles y el derrumbe de dos paredes. En Luj√°n, seis √°rboles no soportaron las intensas r√°fagas. Incendio en Los Corralitos: lograron sofocarlo a metros de viviendas Un r√°pido incendio en medio del fuerte viento sorprendi√≥ a vecinos de Guaymall√©n. Las llamas comenzaron en un campo inculto en calle 2 de Mayo y Severo del Castillo, Los Corralitos, y fue ganando terreno a un ritmo preocupante. R√°pidamente llegaron al lugar dotaciones del bomberos Cuartel Central, bomberos voluntarios de Guaymall√©n y personal de Defensa Civil con apoyo h√≠drico del municipio. La r√°pida intervenci√≥n logr√≥ que las llamas fueran controladas a metros de las viviendas. No se registraron heridos ni da√±os materiales. Se realizan tareas de enfriamiento para evitar nuevos focos. Se le vol√≥ el techo a una estaci√≥n de servicio reci√©n inaugurada Entre los da√±os reportados est√°n la voladura de gran parte de la estructura del techo de una estaci√≥n de servicio que inaugur√≥ el pasado lunes en calle Las Tipas y Corredor del Oeste. Tampoco se reportaron heridos. Refugio con serios da√±os El conocido refugio para perros de la calle: ‚Äú√Ångeles de cuatro patas‚Äù, en Godoy Cruz, sufri√≥ serios da√±os por el viento Zonda. ‚Äú√Ångeles de cuatro patas‚Äù se encuentra en Godoy Cruz, m√°s precisamente en el pedemonte, y se mantiene gracias al esfuerzo de un grupo de colaboradores. Brindan afecto y contenci√≥n a perros de la calle que no pueden ser adoptados porque tienen problemas de salud o edad avanzada. El Boulevard del caf√© fue suspendido Este viernes estaba programado un evento esperado, sobre todo por trabajadores frecuentes del microcentro, el Boulevard Caf√©. en calle Pedro Molina, de Ciudad. All√≠ 20 cafeter√≠as iban a expender sus m√°s deliciosos caf√©s, con variedades de todo el mundo. Pero el fuerte Zonda destruy√≥ los stands y el evento qued√≥ suspendido. La tercera edici√≥n de este gran evento suspendido hoy, 2 de agosto, por las fuertes r√°fagas de viento zonda, fue reprogramado para este s√°bado y domingo. Por el Zonda, el aeropuerto de Mendoza debi√≥ demorar y cancelar vuelos El [ fuerte viento Zonda](https://www.losandes.com.ar/sociedad/fuertes-rafagas-de-viento-zonda-se-registraron-esta-madrugada-en-el-gran-mendoza/) de este viernes oblig√≥ a suspender y demorar las partidas y los arribos de los vuelos en el aeropuerto internacional El Plumerillo. [Aeropuertos Argentina 2000](https://www.aeropuertosargentina.com/) inform√≥ que varios de los vuelos desde las 6.45 fueron cancelados, demorados y/o desviados a otros puntos, incluyendo arribos y partidas desde distintas ciudades del pa√≠s (Aeroparque, Ezeiza, C√≥rdoba) y de Lima (LP 2434 de Latam). Se estima que la situaci√≥n podr√≠a normalizarse hacia el mediod√≠a.

author: /cronologia/-/meta/agencia-efe
title: Expolic√≠a mat√≥ a su exesposa y a su novia tras descubrir romance
text: [Estados Unidos](/cronologia/-/meta/estados-unidos) Un expolic√≠a buscado por los [asesinatos de su exesposa ](https://www.laprensa.hn/fotogalerias/mundo/crueldad-barbara-prieto-asesinada-salia-casa-CN18731535#image-1)y de su novia en el noroeste de Estados Unidos se quit√≥ la vida en medio de una persecuci√≥n policial mientras hu√≠a con su hijo de un a√±o, que result√≥ ileso, seg√∫n inform√≥ la Polic√≠a del estado de Oregon. La polic√≠a de carreteras del estado de Washington hab√≠a emitido el lunes por la noche una ‚Äúalerta √°mbar‚Äù, utilizadas en Estados Unidos en caso de secuestro de menores de edad, para dar con El√≠as Huizar, de 39 a√±os, y su hijo Rom√°n Santos, fruto de su relaci√≥n con una joven de 17 a√±os a la que el expolic√≠a presuntamente asesin√≥ ese mismo d√≠a, al igual que a su exesposa. El veh√≠culo de El√≠as Huizar, que estaba en [ libertad bajo fianza](https://www.laprensa.hn/deportes/espana-dani-alves-tribunal-libertad-condicional-pago-1-millon-euros-fianza-FI18231848) desde febrero, cuando fue acusado de violaci√≥n, lo que motiv√≥ su salida de la Polic√≠a de la ciudad de Yakima, fue detectado por agentes policiales cuando circulaba el martes por una carretera de Oregon, estado vecino al de Washington, cerca de la ciudad de Eugene. Seg√∫n la polic√≠a, se inici√≥ un tiroteo en el que nadie result√≥ herido, pero en medio de la persecuci√≥n El√≠as Huizar choc√≥ contra otro veh√≠culo y el suyo qued√≥ inm√≥vil sobre una mediana de la carretera. Cuando los polic√≠as se acercaron, El√≠as Huizar se dispar√≥ a si mismo, lo que le cost√≥ la vida.El ni√±o no sufri√≥ da√±os y qued√≥ bajo custodia policial. Horas antes El√≠as Huizar se hab√≠a presentado en la escuela elemental Willian Wiley de la ciudad de West Richland, en el estado de Washington, donde trabajaba su exesposa Amber Rodr√≠guez, de 31 a√±os, con quien ten√≠a dos hijos, de 6 y 9 a√±os de edad, la mat√≥ con un arma de fuego y huy√≥, seg√∫n el medio local Tri-City Herald. Custodia de los hijos En busca de El√≠as Huizar la polic√≠a registr√≥ su casa en West Richland, en donde hall√≥ muerta a una persona de la que inicialmente solo dijo que era un allegado al buscado, pero m√°s tarde se supo que era su novia, identificada como Ang√©lica M. Santos en la p√°gina GoFundMe, donde se abri√≥ una cuenta para ayudar a los tres hijos de Huizar. El Tri-City Herald agreg√≥ que la exesposa de El√≠as Huizar, de la que se divorci√≥ en 2020, hab√≠a solicitado recientemente a la justicia que cambiase la custodia de los dos hijos que tuvo con √©l para protegerlos. EFE

author: Dmytro Basmat
title: Hungary renews calls for 'ceasefire' in response to Ukraine's incursion into Kursk Oblast
text: Hungary renewed its calls for a "ceasefire" in response to Ukraine's ongoing incursion into Russia's Kursk Oblast, Prime Minister Viktor Orban's chief of staff, Gergely Gulyas, told reporters on Aug. 22. Responding to questions on the incursion from reporters, Gulyas said that the country "continues to be pro-peace." "Ukraine is not only defending itself but also attacking," Gulyas [said](https://telex.hu/belfold/2024/08/22/gulyas-az-ukranok-kurszki-betoreserol-beket-akarunk) in at press briefing in Budapest. "We want a ceasefire and peace." The comments, which appear to be the country's first public reaction on Ukraine's [incursion](https://kyivindependent.com/tag/kursk-incursion/) into [Kursk Oblast](https://kyivindependent.com/tag/kursk-oblast/), draw stark contrast with statements from Western allies, including the [European Union](https://kyivindependent.com/ukraine-has-legal-right-to-defend-itself-eu-says-on-incursion-in-russias-kursk-oblast/). "The EU continues to fully support Ukraine's legitimate right to defense against Russian aggression and its efforts to restore sovereignty and territorial integrity," European Commission spokesperson Peter Stano said on Aug. 7 following the incursion. Hungary, widely regarded as a [key ally](https://kyivindependent.com/hungarys-orban-congratulates-putin-on-election-win/) of Russia in the EU, had [previously called](https://kyivindependent.com/hungarian-fm-hungary-advocates-for-ceasefire-in-ukraine-but-not-for-russia-to-keep-occupied-territories/) for a ceasefire but insisted that advocating for one does not mean accepting that Russia would keep the Ukrainian territories it currently occupies. The country's prime minister, Viktor Orban, has repeatedly [blocked aid](https://kyivindependent.com/ft-hungary-holding-up-eus-use-of-frozen-russian-assets-to-buy-weapons-for-ukraine/) to Ukraine, pushed for [negotiations](https://kyivindependent.com/zelensky-dismisses-orbans-ceasefire-proposal/), and frequently [spouted Kremlin talking points](https://kyivindependent.com/orban-says-ukraine-should-be-buffer-zone-between-russia-and-west/). Hungary has also condemned the war but has refused to supply Ukraine with [weapons](https://kyivindependent.com/news-feed/defense-ministers-austria-hungary-agree-not-to-supply-weapons-to-ukraine). Since taking the presidency of the European Commission in July, Orban has amped up attempts to stand as a [negotiator](https://kyivindependent.com/orban-pitches-peace-proposal-to-eu/) between Moscow and Kyiv. In July, he embarked on a ‚Äúpeace tour‚Äù and met with [Russian dictator Putin](https://kyivindependent.com/orban-arrives-in-moscow/), [Chinese leader Xi Jinping](https://kyivindependent.com/orban-arrives-in-china-to-discuss-ukraine-russia-war/), and Republican [presidential nominee Donald Trump](https://kyivindependent.com/trump-will-demand-ukraine-hold-peace-talks-with-russia-if-elected-orban-claims/). Orban's visits [sparked criticism](https://kyivindependent.com/eu-members-blasted-orban-over-moscow-trip/) from the EU and President Volodymyr Zelensky. The latter said that NATO and the EU can [resolve the war](https://kyivindependent.com/zelensky-warns-european-leaders-that-putin-may-use-blackmail-to-undermine-unity/) without Orban. In early July, Hungary quietly [changed the rules](https://kyivindependent.com/hungary-simplifies-entry-for-russian-belarusian-citizens-german-media-reports/) for its National Card program to allow Russian and Belarusian "guest workers" to enter the country in a streamlined visa-acquisition process that does away with enhanced security checks or other restrictions. In response to the policy change, European parliamentarians published a letter urging parliament to [reconsider](https://kyivindependent.com/eu-should-reconsider-hungarys-schengen-membership-meps-say/) Hungary's Schengen membership. Earlier on Aug. 22, Ukrainian refugees from southwestern Zakarpattia Oblast began being [evicted](https://kyivindependent.com/hungary-starts-evicting-some-ukrainian-refugees-from-shelters-as-new-law-comes-into-force/) from shelters after in Hungary after the government passed a decree to restrict housing assistance for Ukrainians fleeing their country.
